name: AMPATH POC Maternal Death Review Form v1.0

validators.message: Date of admission should not be greater than the encounter date.
Date of death should not be greater than the admission date.

Was urinalysis assesed and documented during ANC?
Was blood grouping assesed and documented during ANC?
Was HIV testing assesed and documented during ANC?

In cases of complications of abortion Were any of the following interventions conducted:

answers.label: Evacuation of products of conception(MVA, D&C etc)
Other diseases of the blood & blood forming organs and disorders involving immune mechanism
Lack of transport from home to health care facility
Lack of transport between health care facilities
Lack of blood /blood products for transfusion
